workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Install Oracle Database 23c software and create a database

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on Oracle Database Installation.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Install Oracle Database
tutorials.description: How to install the Oracle Database software and create a database with Desktop class (minimal configuration) and Server class (advanced configuration).

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Container Database
tutorials.description: How to create databases using Oracle DBCA with typical configuration and advanced configuration. It does not install the Oracle Database software.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
